commands.statement:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "RepositoryFile" ( "ItemID" TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, "RepositoryID" TEXT NOT NULL, "DependencyID" TEXT, "FileName" TEXT, "PhysicalPath" TEXT, "AbsolutePath" TEXT, "RelativePath" TEXT, "Extension" TEXT, "Size" INTEGER, "MD5" TEXT, "CustomPath1" TEXT, "CustomPath2" TEXT, "CustomPath3" TEXT, "PolicyPath" TEXT, "SortingNo" INTEGER, "Comment" TEXT, "CreatedMemberNo" TEXT, "CreatedAt" TEXT, PRIMARY KEY("ItemID", "RepositoryID") );
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS "IX_RepositoryFile" ON "RepositoryFile" ( "RepositoryID" DESC, "DependencyID" ASC );

SELECT RF.ItemID , RF.RepositoryID , RF.DependencyID , RF.FileName , RF.PhysicalPath , RF.AbsolutePath , RF.RelativePath , RF.Extension , RF.Size , RF.MD5 , RF.CustomPath1 , RF.CustomPath2 , RF.CustomPath3 , RF.PolicyPath , RF.SortingNo , RF.Comment , RF.CreatedMemberNo , strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RF.CreatedAt) AS CreatedAt FROM RepositoryFile RF WHERE RF.RepositoryID = @RepositoryID AND RF.ItemID = @ItemID;

SELECT RF.ItemID , RF.RepositoryID , RF.DependencyID , RF.FileName , RF.PhysicalPath , RF.AbsolutePath , RF.RelativePath , RF.Extension , RF.Size , RF.MD5 , RF.CustomPath1 , RF.CustomPath2 , RF.CustomPath3 , RF.PolicyPath , RF.SortingNo , RF.Comment , RF.CreatedMemberNo , strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', RF.CreatedAt) AS CreatedAt FROM RepositoryFile RF WHERE RF.RepositoryID = @RepositoryID AND CASE WHEN @DependencyID = '' THEN @DependencyID ELSE RF.DependencyID END = @DependencyID;
DELETE FROM RepositoryFile WHERE RepositoryID = @RepositoryID AND ItemID = @ItemID;

UPDATE RepositoryFile SET DependencyID = @TargetDependencyID WHERE RepositoryID = @RepositoryID AND DependencyID = @SourceDependencyID AND CASE WHEN @ItemID = '' THEN @ItemID ELSE ItemID END = @ItemID;

UPDATE RepositoryFile SET FileName = @FileName, PhysicalPath = REPLACE(PhysicalPath, FileName, @FileName), AbsolutePath = REPLACE(AbsolutePath, FileName, @FileName), RelativePath = REPLACE(RelativePath, FileName, @FileName) WHERE RepositoryID = @RepositoryID AND ItemID = @ItemID;
